LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.0.label: stars are aligned
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.0.descri: The astral architects smile upon me, their benevolence is unmatched.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.1.label: stars are perfect
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.1.descri: The stellar bodies above tell a story of imminent fortunes and success.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.2.label: stars are excellent
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.2.descri: The stars whisper to me, and they tell me to breathe easy. My fate is comfortably in their hands.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.3.label: stars are good
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.3.descri: Though small, the constellations tell me all is well for the time being.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.4.label: stars are indifferent
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.4.descri: The stars whisper nonsense and contradictions, our destiny is increasingly unclear.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.5.label: stars are bad
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.5.descri: The skies do not bode well, an ill omen is on the horizon.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.6.label: stars are not on my side
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.6.descri: The sea of stars is ever cloudy, they shroud themselves from me and refuse to tell me of my fate.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.7.label: stars are a bad omen
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.7.descri: The stellar bodies far above have made themselves clear, I am no longer in their favor.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.8.label: stars are aligned… against me
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.8.descri: The planets have aligned, a syzygy has made clear my approaching demise is inescapable. I will shortly be reduced to mere dust.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.0.label: rejoice
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.0.description: Everyone is in good mood, as am I.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.1.label: grieve
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.1.description: Everyone is in bad mood, as am I.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_LowExpectations.stages.0.label: bad mood
LanguageData.VME_Mood_LowExpectations.stages.0.descri: I'm just generally having a bad mood. The Rim is a hostile place.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_HighExpectations.stages.0.label: good mood
LanguageData.VME_Mood_HighExpectations.stages.0.descr: I'm just generally having a good mood. The Rim is an amazing place.
